title: Can German engineering solve the challenges of fusion?
description: With extra government help German firms are attempting to make working fusion reactors.

title: X claims it is erasing 'illegal' Hamas content after EU ultimatum
description: The EU gave the former Twitter 24 hours to respond to an order to clean up "disinformation".

title: FTX thief cashes out millions during Bankman-Fried trial
description: Chunks of the stolen $470m in cryptocurrency have been laundered every day since the trial began
